page.title: 07INDUSTRY
page.content: {BOLNEY GRANGE INDUSTRIAL PARK}:CAR REPAIRS,CAR BODY REPAIRS,PLASTIC INJECTION MOULDING,FURNITURE MAKING & FINISHING,PACKAGING,PORTABLE SHEDS, WELDING, MOTOR CYCLE REPAIRS,UPHOLS_ TERY.{MARINE ENGINES}.MARINE ENGINES SPEEDBOATS,FILTERS Â£ VALVE MANUFACTURE MECH.HANDLING EQUIPT.BUILDING CONSTR. {WHAT WE EXPECTED BEFORE WE WENT THERE} WAS BIG DIRTY FACTORIES, TALL CHIMNEYS BELCHING SMOKE & POLLUTION,LONG CONVEYOR BELTS,LORRIES & FORKLIFTS ROARING ABOUT.{WHAT WE FOUND-} SMALL WORKSHOP UNITS BUILT OF BREEZE BLOCKS, NO HEATING, SOME WITH NO VENTILATION EXCEPT THE DOOR, ONLY 2-8 PEOPLE IN EACH UNIT, NO POLLUTION,GOOD ORGANISATION,TIDINESS. MOST WERE SMALL BUSINESSES RUN BY TWO PEOPLE EMPLOYING A FEW OTHERS, SOME FROM THE YOUTH TRAINING SCHEME. ALL WERE VERY ENTHUSIASTIC ABOUT THEIR VENTURES.
